summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDermalogica Special Cleansing Gel is a iconic soap-free, foaming gel cleanser. Formulated with lavender, it removes impurities and excess oils, leaving the skin feeling smooth and clean, without disturbing the skin's natural moisture balance.
details: DetailsBenefitsGentle, foaming face wash gelRefreshing lather, thoroughly rinses away daily toxins and debris to leave skin feeling soft and smoothLightweight and mild enough to use every day - does not strip or dry out the skinGreat for all skin typesFeatures calming balm mint and lavender extracts to soothe the skin and clear pores without disturbing the skin's natural barrierKey IngredientsLavender: soothes and reduces redness and acne scarringQuillaja Saponaria Bark Extract: naturally foams and cleansesBalm Mint: soothes and cleanses the skinItem 2152628How To UseGently lather a small amount of gel in moistened hands and apply to dampened face and neck. Rinse with warm water. Follow with toner and moisturizer.Tip: Use with an exfoliating face brush.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Butylene Glycol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Quillaja Saponaria Bark Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Cymbopogon Nardus (Citronella) Oil, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Propanediol, Citric Acid, O-Cymen5-Ol, Disodium EDTA, PPG-5-Ceteth-20, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Benzoate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently lather a small amount of gel in moistened hands and apply to dampened face and neck. Rinse with warm water. Follow with toner and moisturizer.Tip: Use with an exfoliating face brush.
